pkgmetadata.longdescription: Discrete Choice (Binary, Poisson and Ordered) Models with Random Parameters // An implementation of simulated maximum likelihood method for the estimation of Binary (Probit and Logit), Ordered (Probit and Logit) and Poisson models with random parameters for cross-sectional and longitudinal data as presented in Sarrias (2016) doi:10.18637/jss.v074.i10.
